attributes.action: Keep the original "Thomas the Tank Engine" theme tune
attributes.additional_details:
After aeons of youngsters (such as myself) growing up with the dulcet tones of Thomas the Tank Engine surrounding their sweet and innocent ears...

A crime of unspeakable heresy has been committed.

The theme tune has been butchered and changed in an attempt (one can only assume) to petrify children and deter them from going anywhere near railway tracks once they come of age.

This unsavoury tactic by the government has not gone unseen.
The theft of railway cables will - I'm sure - still be committed by errant youths.

Sign this petition in order to make the Government realise we DO have a voice, and that it's inherently wrong to punish those who do no wrong.

Sign this petition to once again immortalise Thomas. The invincible Tank Engine.
